name: Bastion Dedication
summary: You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat.
description:
You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat. You gain the Reactive Shield fighter feat. This fulfills any prerequisite requiring Reactive Shield as normal.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the bastion archetype.Bastion Dedication Leads To...

Destructive Block, Disarming Block, Drive Back, Nimble Shield Hand, Shield SalvationTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Dedication: You must select a feat with this trait to apply an archetype to your character.
